title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4223.9 - Graded races
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4223.9 - Graded races

State Regulations

Any track where graded races are run the racing secretary
shall post on the bulletin commission prior to the time of entry a list of all
eligible horses grouped under the grades in which they will be allowed to
compete. No horse may be added to this list after entry has begun without the
consent of those who enter eligible horses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4223.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
